original_text: So the people sent to Shiloh and brought from there the ark of the covenant of the Lord of hosts, who is enthroned on the cherubim. And the two sons of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were there with the ark of the covenant of God.
korean_text: 이에 백성이 실로에 사람을 보내어 그룹 사이에 계신 만군의 여호와의 언약궤를 거기서 가져왔고 엘리의 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스는 하나님의 언약궤와 함께 거기에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: So the people sent to Shiloh
and brought from there the ark of the covenant
who is enthroned on the cherubim
And the two sons of Eli
were there with the ark of the covenant of God
